Verify the 'Product Details' tabbed interface has exactly 3 tabs
Verify the 'Description' tab is active/selected, indicated by background color #FFFFFF, font weight 700, and a 2px solid #007bff bottom border
Verify inactive tabs have font weight 400 and color #6C757D
Verify the 'Product Info' tooltip is initially hidden
Hover over the info icon

Verify the tooltip becomes visible, displaying text 'More details about this product', with background color #333333, font color #FFFFFF, font size 12px, border radius 4px, 10px padding, and positioned at x 20px, y 15px relative to the icon

Verify the 'New Messages' notification badge is visible, displays a count of '3' as its text content, has background color #DC3545, font color #FFFFFF, font size 10px, border radius 50%, width 20px, height 20px, and positioned at x -5px, y -5px relative to its parent icon
Verify the image carousel displays exactly 5 slides
Verify the currently active slide image has source 'carousel_image_01.jpg', alt text 'Scenic Mountain View', and rendered dimensions 1000x400px
Verify the image carousel transitions to the next slide via an animation lasting 500ms
Verify the 'Next' arrow button is visible and enabled
